tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Secrets
programme.desc: Admiral Chegwidden, Mac and Bud Roberts are taken hostage in the Admiral's office by Pvt. Magida, a Marine who escaped from a nearby Federal prison.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Ghosts
programme.desc: Harm and Mac investigate an attempt on Admiral Chedwiggen's life and uncover the fact that all the members of his former SEAL team have died under mysterious circumstances.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Full Engagement
programme.desc: While on their day off, Harm takes Mac for a flight in his vintage airplane, only to be forced to make an emergency landing in a mountain clearing because of mechanical problems.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Cowboys and Cossaks
programme.desc: Harm, Mac, and Bud are assigned sea duty to monitor a joint war games exercise between U.S. and Russian naval forces.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Guardian
programme.desc: Harm and Mac defend Bauwer, a former Navy Seal, now a homeless man, who's accused of using excessive force when he killed three men who tried to hold up a convenience store.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: This Is The Pits
programme.desc: Walter must swim through the deadly La Brea Tar Pits when Team Scorpion helps a woman trapped in the tar before she runs out of oxygen.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Wreck The Halls
programme.desc: It's Christmas Eve and Team Scorpion's electronics-free mountain getaway turns deadly when they come across gun-runners, and Ralph is kidnapped when they try to escape.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Ice Ca-Cabes
programme.desc: When a mission in the desert results in exploding shrapnel that seriously wounds Cabe, Team Scorpion must freeze his body in order to save his life.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Faux Money Maux Problems
programme.desc: When Team Scorpion is duped into producing counterfeit money for a foreign entity intent on ruining the U.S. economy, Paige must rely on her mother Veronica's skills as a grifter to save them.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: The Hole Truth
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must save a man teetering on the edge of a massive sink hole that threatens to destroy the Los Angeles water supply forever.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Breaking Up the Band
programme.desc: Now that Sam and Marlo’s baby girl has arrived (Ep. 520), it’s clear nothing could have prepared Andy for this moment. So when Juliet offers Andy an opportunity to leave town for 4 months on an undercover project, Andy starts to consider it.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: 74 Epiphanies
programme.desc: Andy and Sam’s wedding comes just in time for the gang to celebrate one last hurrah. But when Andy is taken off-course by a hitchhiker and then stranded on the side of a dead-end road with a dying man, she finds herself with no way to get help.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Blink
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the night’s traumatic events, Andy and Dov try to pull themselves together at an all-night diner, but are caught off-duty and off-guard in a volatile diner hold-up.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: All by Her Selfie
programme.desc: Oliver gets promoted and Andy is tasked with training 15 Division’s newest rookie, Duncan Moore. But when Andy and Duncan respond to a messy homicide at a pawnshop, it’s clear this rookie is going to give Andy the challenge of a lifetime.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Heart Breakers, Money Makers
programme.desc: When Andy and Nick’s seizure at an illegal gambling house leads to a suspicious confession, Andy recruits Sam to help figure out who’s lying, why, and where the money is, before anyone gets hurt.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Wanting
programme.desc: When a tenement-building shooting leads to the discovery of an executed gang leader, 15 Division must race to find the killer before a gang war breaks out.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Part two of their investigation into Clifton Hall sees the team splitting with going it alone. For one of the team the night becomes terrifying as they find themselves locked in a room with an unseen force.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her team take on their largest investigation to date. They have been invited to investigate a large estate where it seems just about every building has a ghostly tale.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: As the team split up the fear become palpable. Without the safety of numbers the team are feeling they are being stalked and Glen comes face to face with some unexplained physical phenomena.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: With the team on edge, they explore deeper into the darkness of this incredible place of mystery and secrets. Is the feeling of unease just in their minds or is something about to reveal itself.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: The team are still spread thinly across this huge location and without the safety of numbers some of the investigators seem easy prey.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: 200th Episode: Grant is Back
programme.desc: On this 2 hour special, TAPS celebrates their 200th episode by re-visiting one of their favorite and most haunted locations, Trans-Allegheny Lunatic Asylum and by calling on old friends, Grant, Dustin and Joe.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Moonshine & Madness
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters: slavery, murder and madness are behind the hauntings at the notorious Graham Mansion. TAPS travels to Virginia to determine the true source of the claims that have taken place at this historical location.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Due Date With Death
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Rochester, New York to investigate the Rochester Public Library's 15 years of claims. There's reason to believe that two deaths associated with the building could be behind the activity.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan and Rommie must rescue Tyr, Harper and Rev from a Magog Worldship.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan, Beka, Rev and Tyr crash land after escaping a gang of Nietzscheans, but soon face a new threat: Rev's need to feed.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew must steal a jewel that is at the center of a feud between a Drift owner and the Than. Beka falls for a security chief who was formerly a thief.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Pitiless As the Sun
programme.desc: Andromeda answers a distress call when a cargo ship is attacked.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Last Call at the Broken Hammer
programme.sub-title: Last Call at the Broken Hammer
programme.desc: The crew looks for a long-lost Commonwealth leader who has gone into hiding.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.97
programme.desc: A woman accuses her ex-roommate-to-be of stealing her security deposit; she is countersued for rent and money owed/A 21st birthday celebration ends with a young woman allegedly wrapping a borrowed car around a pole.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.110
programme.desc: Custody of a beautiful, homemade baptismal gown is disputed by entranged family members/While driving with her five children in the car, a woman runs a red light, is arrested and is later sued by her uncle who claims he bailed her out.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.239
programme.desc: A landlord fights with tenants over a new motorcycle ignition, a damaged helmet, and an insurance bill; he countersues for unpaid rent and utilities.\t\t\t\r\nA young woman goes after her former roommate and his girlfriend for rent and a security deposit.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.64
programme.desc: A woman claims she was doused with lighter fluid during an argument with her ex-roommate; he claims she had him falsely arrested and countersues for return of belongings.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.146
programme.desc: A man denies popping the tires and smashing the truck windows of his ex-girlfriend’s new boyfriend’s vehicle in a jealous rampage.\t\t\t\r\nEx-lovers accuse each other of having drug problems during a fight over an alleged loan for a motorcycle.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.120
programme.desc: A woman and her teen daughter accuse an estranged relative of assaulting them at a family party/A woman is suing her former friend for repossessing her truck; her friend argues that the vehicle was never insured.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.227
programme.desc: A lease agreement scrutiny challenges a woman's right to sue ex-tenants for property damage during a fight. A woman sues a former co-worker for loans to bail him out of jail and pay bills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.225
programme.desc: A violent breakup leads ex-lovers to dispute damages from an assault, hotel fees, and destroyed property. Allegations of infidelity arise as a woman sues her ex-boyfriend for unpaid furniture, countered with claims of her ongoing relationship.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.189
programme.desc: A handgun comes between a brother and sister who sue over the alleged destruction of property during a heated fight.\t\t\t\r\nAccusing his mother of losing his rightful inheritance, a man denies owing her for unpaid loans and car insurance payments.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.12
programme.desc: Woman sues ex for car payments, damages, unpaid tickets, and property return; he countersues for car value/Co-workers' horseplay leads to ruptured eye socket; they dispute damage responsibility.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.26
programme.desc: Intoxicated bride sues friend for face punch at wedding, accused teen claims self-defense/Woman accuses ex of cheating, he defends as moving on; dispute over living room set balance.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Martin Yan judges six Chinese dishes created by the remaining contestants; during dinner service, one team disappoints a VIP guest; a contestant is eliminated.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants enter an animal pen to determine which type of protein they will cook in the team challenge; during dinner service, the contestants must impress chef Ramsay's family.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must create five steak dishes; a diner finds an unpleasant surprise in her dish during dinner service; the elimination round brings out bad tempers.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay puts two teams of wannabe chefs through a series of gruelling challenges as they battle for the ultimate prize of a head chef position at his Las Vegas restaurant. The two teams are challenged to throw a party fit for a princess.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs compete to participate in a photo shoot and host a dinner for members of the Army.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Disaster at the Derby
programme.desc: The repo team confronts the toughest challenge yet: one-on-one interviews with an anger management specialist. Lyndah and Froy head to the Hollywood Hills to find a luxury sedan.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Trouble with Tractors
programme.desc: The team gets back to work, but have their anger management sessions had any effect? Sonia and Lyndah find themselves surrounded by a gang of roller derby girls who've got the skills to protect their car, Lou and Sonia get lost in translation...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Welcome Back Rotter
programme.desc: Matt and Froy crash the meeting of a fraternal lodge to ask for a car, but instead, they get an angry old man with a rifle. Froy and Matt go on a repo that turns into a battle royale.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Five Things
programme.desc: Jeff can't think of five nice things to say about Audrey; Russell encourages Timmy to serenade a woman; Jennifer and Adam mistakenly get Jeff and Audrey's bank statement.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Meat Wars
programme.desc: Audrey drags Jen to a Bon Jovi concert to prove that she's still young and fun, leaving Jeff and Adam at home. Russell finds a phone number in his pocket and asks Timmy to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Goodbye Dolly
programme.desc: Audrey tries to prepare for motherhood by continuing to repair a doll that she keeps damaging. Meanwhile, Jeff questions whether the very pregnant Brenda should be dating anymore, and Adam tries to convince Jennifer that he is a manly man.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey's Shower
programme.desc: Jen puts the wrong date on the invitations to Audrey's baby shower, Jeff likes Audrey's maternity clothes, and Russell gives up women.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Liz Moves In
programme.desc: Liz temporarily moves in with Jeff and Audrey. Jeff isn't happy with the new guest, but changes his mind when he discovers Liz consistently takes his side against Audrey.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Taking Names
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey realize that the names on their baby list are also the names of women that Russell has slept with. Adam becomes a cycling enthusiast after Jennifer suggests they start riding bikes in the park.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Feeling lonely after her cat dies, Liz looks for a sperm donor. When Timmy's intellect and innocence don't attract his crush, he tries his hand at playing 'big dog.' Adam rips the vintage wedding dress that Jennifer's family sent her.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cupcake
programme.desc: Russell gets jealous when Timmy manages to outshine him at his own pick-up game. Adam and Jennifer leave pot-laced cupcakes on the kitchen counter, and an unaware Jeff eats one.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fountain Of Youth
programme.desc: After meeting up with college friends who are no longer into partying, Jeff and Audrey set out to prove that even with a baby on the way, they can still have fun. Meanwhile, Timmy attempts to find Russell's compassionate side.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Baby Talk
programme.desc: When Audrey bonds with their unborn baby by reading her stories, a paranoid Jeff believes that she is trying to form an alliance against him. Meanwhile, Russell steals an article that Timmy wrote.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Kid Stuff
programme.desc: A fugitive from justice is on the lam and it's Dog's job to find him. When they hit the last known address they discover he already has pulled up stakes and left no forwarding address. The posse's one hope is to locate his girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: True Identity
programme.desc: Dog knows that looks can be deceiving. The fugitive is pretty, petite, and trouble. She stands accused of settling an argument with the help of a box cutter. What Dog does not anticipate is how deceptive this femme fatale can truly be!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Thief Who Stole Christmas
programme.desc: It's Christmas day, and Dog sets out to nab Raymond, who robs to support his ice habit, and give him a little Christmas gift - shiny new handcuffs.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Friends and Neighbors
programme.desc: Dog and his posse head to Colorado for a special mission, to catch Marco, an alleged drug dealer. It's been ten months since Marco went on the lam, and his bondsman stands to lose his family business if Marco is not caught.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: And Baby Makes Three
programme.desc: Leland has to attend a Lamaze class before he can join the hunt--another Chapman is on the way! But when Dog starts to go after this accused jewelry thief without his fastest son, he learns that this fugitive puts the "R" in runner.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Bags and Boxers
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Tender Trap
programme.desc: When Dog discovers today's prey is a notorious ladies man, he knows just how to lure him in. The trap includes a suggestive phone call, a motel rendezvous, and a crew of bounty hunters waiting in the next room ready to break up the party!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: When a Stranger Calls
programme.desc: When an offender with a long record ducks his day in court, Bobby Brown knows whom to call - The Dog!? And knowing that few souls can resist Beth's clever persuasion, Dog gives her the job of luring the fugitive in.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Looking Back and Talking Quack
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Grass & The Furious
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck for the Duckmen when an old high school nemesis challenges them to a good old-fashioned race.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Driving Miss Sadie
programme.desc: With Sadie's driver's license test fast approaching, she finds herself in dire need of lessons. Willie, Jase and Si each set out to correct her glaring failures behind the wheel by teaching her how to drive... Robertson-style.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Truck Commander
programme.desc: After Willie's son, John Luke, leaves Willie's pickup in the driveway with a bone-dry gas tank, Willie and Korie decide that it's time to get the kid his own car.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Si-Yonara
programme.desc: The Duck Commander assembly room gets an unexpected shakeup when a disgruntled Si decides to quit his job.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Play
programme.desc: Willie finds his office in shambles and alerts the authorities that the warehouse has had a break in.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sweatin' Bullets
programme.desc: When a heat wave envelops West Monroe the air conditioning unit at the Duck Commander warehouse goes down, turning the duck call assembly room into a boiling sweatshop.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Spring Pong Cleaning
programme.desc: After Korie decides the junk piles in the Duck Commander warehouse are beginning to reach critical mass, she calls on Willie and the guys to do a little company spring-cleaning.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Morning, West Monroe
programme.desc: After attending a local radio show as a guest, Willie sees an opportunity to host a show of his own.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Of Mattresses and Men
programme.desc: The Jase, Si and the guys from the duck call room take a field trip to a brand new local donut shop and quickly find out who amongst them can eat the most delicious treats.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Samurai Si
programme.desc: Willie receives a special gift from a Japanese business associate - a "priceless" samurai sword, which Willie keeps out of the hands of Jase and the guys.(n)

programme.title: Solar Attack
programme.desc: When the sun's increasing expulsions of plasma threaten to ignite methane in our atmosphere, international tensions rise while scientists race for a solution to avoid natural disaster.(n)

programme.title: Capricorn One
programme.desc: A NASA Mars mission won't work, and its funding is endangered, so they decide to fake it just this once. But then they have to keep the secret. Starring: Elliott Gould, James Brolin, Brenda Vaccaro, O.J. Simpson, Sam Waterston.(n)

programme.title: Solar Impact: The Destruction of London
programme.desc: Solar debris crashes down to Earth, causing widespread destruction and unleashing solar radiation around the world. As genetic mutations rapidly spread, a group of friends must fight to stay alive and escape the chaos.(n)

programme.title: George And The Dragon
programme.desc: A knight (James Purefoy, "Rome") returning from the Crusades takes on a dragon after the disappearance of the kindly Princess Lunna (Piper Perabo, "Coyote Ugly"). With Patrick Swayze.(n)

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: While helping a handful of plane crash survivors cope with their grief, young psychologist Claire Summers (2008 Best Actress, Oscar® nominee Anne Hathaway, Rachel Getting Married) begins to uncover conflicting accounts of the accident. rated -PG-13.(n)

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Sam Peel is in a stable relationship with Kayla, and raising a child together, he seeks a peaceful existence. But having made enemies through the years who still hold a grudge, it's just a matter of time before Sam's past comes back to haunt him.(n)

programme.title: 2012: Ice Age
programme.desc: When a volcanic eruption in Iceland sends a glacier hurtling toward North America, a family struggles to escape the onslaught of the coming ice age.(n)

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: Set in 1968, a German Shepherd enrolled by his family in a training program that will send him to serve American soldiers in Vietnam. Even when Rain is wounded, he saves many, and bonds with a soldier who learns much from this very special dog.(n)

programme.title: The Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Two highly skilled martial arts warriors must train an American teen so that he is able to fight a centuries old battle to free the Monkey King.(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Christmas
programme.desc: When Ashley’s plans to reconnect with her high school sweetheart over Christmas fails, she and her best friend Liam decide to fake their own romance. But as her feelings start to turn real, Ashley will have to decide what her heart really wants.(n)

programme.title: You Can’t Fight Christmas
programme.desc: Interior designer Leslie Major loves all things Christmas. When she meets handsome Edmund James, she quickly learns he thinks the festivities are frivolous and superficial.(n)

programme.title: Almost Christmas
programme.desc: Rene and Dennis try one last con in this crazy Christmas comedy starring Paul Rudd, Paul Giamatti and Sally Hawkins.(n)

programme.title: Presumed Dead
programme.desc: An international crime novelist is the primary suspect in the disappearance of a young woman and it's up to Detective Mary Anne Cooper to piece together this bizarre missing person's case.(n)

programme.title: The Bachelor Next Door
programme.desc: A newly engaged couple becomes intrigued by the young stranger who moves in next door. He's handsome, friendly and very helpful, but he's no stranger.(n)

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones. Starring: Johnny Depp, Frank Langella, Lena Olin.(n)

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: A madman forces young friends to kill one another to try to survive a sadistic game.(n)

programme.title: Mortdecai
programme.desc: Armed with only his good looks and special charm, an art dealer (Johnny Depp) travels the world to find a stolen painting that is rumored to contain the code to a bank account filled with Nazi gold.(n)

programme.title: Madea's Witness Protection
programme.desc: Placed under federal protection in Madea's (Tyler Perry) Southern home, a Wall Street banker (Eugene Levy) and his dysfunctional family get a taste of the no-nonsense matriarch's special brand of tough love.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Loyalty
programme.desc: Doc Holliday hits a long winning streak at the card tables and winds up with stock in a mine and railroad, both of which soon have a tremendous jump in value.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Johnny Behan Falls in Love
programme.desc: Wyatt finds himself in the awkward position of having to help crooked Sheriff Behan.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Casey and the Clowns
programme.desc: Earp prepares for trouble when a group known as the Harlequins is expected to return to town. Although they disguise themselves as clowns, they have sinister intentions.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Doc Holliday Faces Death
programme.desc: Doc Holliday takes a turn for the worse causing Dr. Goodfellow to recommend that Doc cut back on drinking.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Apache Gold
programme.desc: The Clanton gang is selling liquor to the Apaches with Ike and Phin hoping their contact will tell the location of hidden gold rumored to be in a cave.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: The Good Mule and the Bad Mule
programme.sub-title: The Good Mule and the Bad Mule
programme.desc: A lie told by a young boy about Shotgun's mule Roscoe kicking him causes a newspaper war between the Nugget and the Epitaph.(n)

programme.title: Meek's Cutoff
programme.desc: Settlers traveling through the Oregon desert in 1845 find themselves stranded in harsh conditions.(n)

programme.title: The Nutcracker
programme.desc: In 1920s Vienna, lonely Mary receives a nutcracker doll from her Uncle Albert. On Christmas Eve, her imagination brings it to life as "NC," leading her on a perilous journey against the Rat King's plot to overthrow humanity.(n)

programme.title: Mark & Russell's Wild Ride
programme.desc: Mark is excited when the most popular girl in his class asks HIM to drive her to a party, except he doesn't have a license. With his popularity on the line and his best friend Russell in tow, Mark hits the road on a cross-town adventure.(n)

programme.title: Mumbo Jumbo
programme.desc: Thomas Doubting stumbles upon a magical amulet which takes him on a mysterious journey to the island of Sinmouth. The locals believe he is 'Mumbo Jumbo' – an entity who will restore their fortunes and rescue the beautiful Princess Vanilla.(n)

programme.title: A Doggone Adventure
programme.desc: Just Jesse the Jack Russell and a group of junior detectives find things get very mysterious when they find themselves entangled in a world of UFOs and secret agents. A Doggone Adventure is a rip roaring, fast paced adventure for all the family.(n)

programme.title: Bandidas
programme.desc: In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.(n)

programme.title: Girl Most Likely
programme.desc: A failed New York playwright awkwardly navigates the transition from Next Big Thing to Last Year's News. Starring: Kristen Wiig, Annette Bening, Matt Dillon, Natasha Lyonne.(n)

programme.title: The Cannonball Run
programme.desc: The classic comedy with cool stars and even cooler cars! Based on a true race event, Burt Reynolds leads an all-star cast in the ultimate quest to win The Cannonball Run.(n)

programme.title: The Captive Heart
programme.desc: An imprisoned Czech captain (who impersonated a dead Englishman) must convince British POWs that he is not an enemy spy.(n)

programme.title: On the Night of the Fire
programme.desc: A barber gives in to temptation and commits a theft, stealing some money from another shopkeeper, which leads to his involvement in blackmail and murder.(n)

programme.title: Penny and the Pownall Case
programme.desc: A glamour model helps Scotland Yard to catch a criminal gang.(n)

programme.title: Floods of Fear
programme.desc: Two inmates who have been put to work during a severe flood are washed away in the strong current, along with their guard. The trio find refuge in an isolated house partly engulfed with water but also containing a frightened woman.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a homemaker and mother involved in the feminist movement of the '60s, who must fight the chauvinistic beliefs of her husband (guest star Max Gail). With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of the celebrated sex therapist Dr. Ruth (guest star Dr. Ruth Westheimer) and finds himself dispensing advice on her radio talk show. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into what he believes to be a vampire, and must keep away from his new bride (Shae D'Lynn) to prevent himself from biting her. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: Return of the Evil Leaper - October 8, 1956
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of a 1950's college student who is posing as a superhero.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: Revenge of the Evil Leaper - September 16, 1987
programme.desc: Alia's (Renee Coleman) arrival precipitates a ``lover's leap'' with Sam (Scott Bakula) that lands them in a women's prison where Zoey (Carolyn Seymour) attempts to kill them.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes Marilyn Monroe's (Susan Griffiths) chauffeur to keep her from committing suicide, but Marilyn's new secretary (Liz Vassey) may prevent Sam's rescue. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Out of the Past
programme.desc: Claudia discovers that she was Cleopatra's servant in a past life when she experiences déjà vu while watching a catalog from an Ancient Egyptian relics exposition.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Eyes of Toklamanee
programme.desc: Sydney and her student Adam are onto his ancestors' fabled Eyes of Toklamanee, but they are pursued by mysterious gunmen.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Run Sydney Run
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel are ambushed in Russia. Two weeks later, Sydney wakes up in the house of a man called Tsarlov, who claims to have saved her.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: M.I.A.
programme.desc: Sydney gets kidnapped, but by whom? Nigel, Claudia and Cate will have to go through the list of enemies Sydney has made in the past and deduce which of them is responsible. Cue flashbacks.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Beacon/One Life, Furnished in Early Poverty
programme.sub-title: The Beacon/One Life, Furnished in Early Poverty
programme.desc: Physician stranded in wary village/Gus Rosenthal revisits past, meets younger self. Guiding him, Gus realizes mistakes.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Night of the Digging Dead
programme.desc: A custom-built shark cage; 1900s pathologist's dissection toolkit; 1940s embalming pump and one of the first electric bone saws.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Smoking Ton
programme.desc: WW2 Stuart M3 tank barrel and heavy duty tank treads; rare, collectors' 1890 silver inlayed humidor; high-end industrial meat slicer in the ultimate restaurant unit.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chicago Grand Slam
programme.desc: 1984 Yamaha SS440 Snowmobile that introduced the revolutionary shock absorber suspension; rare autographed 1920s baseball glove; mint Hank Aaron signed baseball; authentic 1950s Robby the Robot collector toy.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hidden Hot Wheels
programme.desc: Ton and Allen challenge a big time auction buyer on his home turf. The guys uncover a 1969 Chevelle Malibu muscle car and a single-shot pistol designed to aid Allied resistance fighters during WWII.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Dallas Mavericks
programme.desc: Military-grade Tomahawk cruise missile jet engine; century-old handcrafted wild west cowboy saddle; 1960s high roller's gold money.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sink or Swim
programme.desc: 1905 Hand-crank Thomas Edison gramophone with cylindrical records; a discontinued Addictor 190 Mini Boat; a rare 1897 Regina music box.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chi-Town Showdown
programme.desc: Metal Victorian-era burial casket; 1870s glass fire extinguisher grenades; a mechanical 1896 handcrafted Chicago fire station alarm box.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Rodeo Ton
programme.desc: 1970s El Toro mechanical bull used to train bull riders; silver WWII era banjo; a collection of 1800s handcrafted hunting duck decoys.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Choo-Choo, Cha-Ching!
programme.desc: Ton and Allen get a surprise second chance after nearly getting shut out in the small town of Palmer. They uncover a motorized railroad maintenance car from the 1960's and a pre-WWI Japanese semi-automatic pistol.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Dead Aim
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face-off against an auction buyer with shady bidding tactics and even more questionable fashion sense. The guys find a custom-built monowheel & a rifle designed to ward off grave robbers in the early 19th century!(n)
